text:
Aakash Landelwal (not a typo): Hum dono bc aise ajeeb raasto pe chalte h hamesha ki thokar lagte hi dusre ka sahaara mil jaata h. ICPC nahi kr paaye iska regret rahega thoda, but apni preparation bohot fun thi bhai. Mai tu Rishabh, kya machaate the bc coding me, Ritesh Mishra tkk to nahi, par khush rehte the inhi cheezo me. 

Khandu, bhai terse bohot expectations h mujhe, tu kuch bada krega aage jaake. Jo teri hunger h na success ke liye wo terko bohot aage leke jayegi. Pata nahi kyu aisa lgg raha h maine ye pehle bhi bola h terko. Anyways, never stop believing in yourself. Kabhi bhi doubt me aaye, mai hu hamesha. Future me agar kabhi mai bolu ki abhi busy hu, to bas tu bol ki zaroori h, behenchod usi samay tere liye free ho jaunga. Tere jaise dost kismat waalo ko milte h, aur mera jiwan safal ho gya ki meri kismat itni mast h.

Terse to lifelong sampark me rehna h to zyada bhawnao me nahi behte.

PS: Apne weird jokes aur rona thoda km kr de to definitely badhiya bandi mil jayegi, warna hamare jaise lode hi milenge.
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Mishra lodu. Kaise ho, maal bana rahe ho? Nice. Mai bong me paani bhar ke laaya. Tera transformation from "Hum sex ke baare me koi baat nahi krte" to "Weed god", taareef ka haqdar h. Maujila aadmi to h hi tu, magar bohot sensitive bhi, Hall-9 me dekha tha, Ritesh ke jaane ke baad. Aage pata nahi kab milo tum, magar ek din mai zaroor dhundta hua aaunga tumhe, tab tum taiyyar rehna.

Love you bro <3
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Likh raha hu Memoir Behenchod, gaand me ghus jao insaan ke!

Aur Amity, tere to alag hi kaand rahe h bhai college me, dost ki bandio pe haath daalna, bina high hue chutiyon ki tarah haste rehna aur bohot. Arya ka tune sahi khola Hall-9 me, BC mujhe neend aa rrahi thi subah 9 baje aur tu bhosdika bole ja raha tha. Tere saath Thukra ke mera pyar dekhne me bohot maza aaya. Bohot dil ke baatein ki h terse, bhulenge nahi kabhi. Long walks with maata raani ke songs are life. Do onion mayo aur 1 aaloo roll is life. Badminton is life. Talking about chicks is life. 

Amitesh, tune bohot kuch sikhaya h life me hame. NOT INCEST though, wi tera personal matter h ;)

On a serious note: Miss krta hu tujhe bohot, tum jaise doston ko regular phone nahi kia jaata, lekin jitna pyaar h na dil me tumhare liye, usse dua zaroor krta hu upar waale se, ki hamesha tum life me khush raho. Tu mile na mile, mai terko dhoond nikaalunga zaroor. 

After all, mai bhosdika hu hi ni. :)
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Sharma ji ke ladke dekho kahan se kahan aa gaye. Ek time pe terko CP ke tips dete the, placement aate aate terse tips lene lage :). Bro, tere Badminton racket Aakash ne toda, isliye mai usko toda. Lekin bhai treat to terko dunga next time milte hi. Bucket list me tera bhi naam h pyaare. 

Thank you for making my journey through IITK this awesome. Love you bro <3
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Abe tu tha idhar?!! Mzak kr raha hu. Maybe agar kisi aur circumstance me mile hote to shayad achhe dost ban jaate. IITK me to kabhi bola nahi magar memoir ke through hi lelo

Chaapu Atharv

Bye bro, Best of Luck. Dekhte h zindagi me kab milenge.
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Dinesh bhai merko memoir likhna pasand nahi h. Beeti hue lamhe yaad krke khushi to hoti h par utna hi dukh bhi hota ki wo kabhi wapas nahi aayenge. Par BHOSDIKE tu to rahega hi apne saath. 

Kuch aisi cheezein bol dun jo shayad kabhi mu pe na hi bolu mai: Dinesh bhai, mai terko pehli baar takneek ki robot workshop me dekha tha, terko hamare grp me patak dia gaya tha. Tab to merko tu bohot bade waala laga. Lekin dheere dheere baatein badhi, Mech ke lectures attend krne apan saath jaate the, wo ek raat pehle assignments ki taskari karna, notes ki taskari karna. Ye bas wahi kuch cheez h jo merko lagaati h ki Mech me aana worth it tha. 

Roast bohot accha krta h tu logo ka, keep up the good work. And btw, yes mai roya tha teri Hall-9 ki vidaii me. Love you so much bro.
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Mai to teri life me naya hu, to zyada maayine shayad na rakhein meri baatein lekin fir bhi, raha nahi gaya. 

Terse baatein to Hall-4 aur Hall-9 me hi hui, par lagta h pure 4 year terse dosti rahi h. Pandey, tu apne emotions zyada show nahi krta, tabhi bhosdike BT me rehta h fookne ke baad. Respectable aadmi h tu. Wo subah tkk ka Game of Life bhulunga nahi kabhi. Uss din ke baad u are a tough contentder for my Number 7 spot. Teri love story is one of the most weird and pathetic one, nice try tho. 

Hope you find someone a lot better.

Aur haan, bohot sutte udhaar h terpe bhosdike. Next time maachis aur sutte dono leke aaiyo.

#Ghar_pe_aise_message_matt_bhej
#Pandey_deserves_better
#Team_Pandey
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Zenith Viper ka tempo high rahega hamesha!

Hitesh bhai, tu meri gym ki motivation to raha hi hai hamesha lekin ultimate hangout jagah bhi. Wo Truth and Dare to kabhi bhulne se rahe, lekin next time jab milenge to pushup zaroor lagwaunga terse sadak pe. Bohot nasheela aadmi h tu, baaton me uljhaake time ka pata hi nahi lagta tha ki kab nikal gaya. Tere jaisa bhai paake sab naseeb ho gya mujhe. 

Love you yaar. Rajasthan aake terko panje me haraunga next time pakka <3.
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Bhai mai to terko Rahul hi bulata hu. (-_-)

Dekh bhai, yaadein to h hi mere dil me, to unhe likhke koi faayeda to h nai. Mai terko kuch aisi cheezein convey kr skta hu jo shayad kabhi mu pe na bolu.

College life aur fun hoti mere liye agar tu 3rd year me drift off na kara hota GH. Gine chune to dost the mere usme se ek bhi agar jaye to mere jaiso ki to gaand khul jaati thi. Tu jb bhi peeche baithke CSGO ka gameplay dekhta tha mera, achha lgta tha. Jab bhi dono saath me baithke tournaments dekhte the, accha lgta tha. Jab bhi dono Sanjay ki gaand lete the, achha lgta tha. Jab dono saath me baithke Hall-9 me daaru piye the, accha lgta tha. Jab dono, IITK ke CS tournament me khele the, achha lagta tha.

Bhoolio matt kon terko kandhe pe bitha ke OAT leke jaata tha, literally XD.

Divided by GH, United by Daaru and Gaanja.

Terko to mai ye bhi nahi bolunga ki touch me rahiyo, wo to tu rahega hi pata h

Anyways, mai sachhai ka saath kabhi nahi chodunga. :-)
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Ram ji ki chaal dekho, aankhon ki majaal dekho.

Ye wahi aankhein h jinme mai kho jaata tha daaru peeke. #no_homo btw

Mast aadmi h bhai tu, bohot mze kiye h among us me aur daaru party me. Contact me rehna bhai, bhool mtt jana. <3
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Aur Sanjay!

French kiss ke baare me likh ke waqt barbaad nahi karte. Wo to waise hi puri duniya ko pata h tere baare me.
Tera first impression: Ek to ye behenchod har samay smile kyu krta rehta h, high h kya bsdk.

Ab kuch dil ki baat jiska aage kabhi zikr mtt krio mere saamne warna gaad dunga terko: 

Tu best roommate raha h mera, undeniably. Bohot sensitive aur seedha aadmi h tu bro and aisa hi rahio. Terse jitni baari bhi ladai krke terko dukhi kia h, uske liye "FUCK YOU, NO SORRY, AAGE BHI KRUNGA BKL". Ye apan last project kr rahe h saath me I think. Uske baad tu pata ni kab hi mile.  Jab bhi college me Computer science se related kuch krne jaata tha, terse sabse pehle discuss krta tha. Still agar merko koi job interview dena hoga with CP, terko call krunga pkka. Terse life me bohot expectations h mujhe, ki tu kuch better krega. Lekin tu apne social skills pe work kr bhai. Learn how to take charge of situation and be confident. Outstanding intellect to h hi tere paas already. Love you bhai, ho ske to bhoolna matt
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Ritesh bhai, inn sab memoirs me shayad mera dab kr reh jaye thoda. Lekin jitna mai terko jaanta hu, tu dil se lagayega meri bhi baaton ko. 

Kuch baatein dil ki jo mai keh ni paatya mu pe kabhi: Jaise fashion models, "You're beautiful", "You're gorgeoous" sunn sunn ke bor ho jaati h, waise hi terko "Chaapu" keh keh ke bor nahi karunga. Zyada mile nahi h hum waise but tu aisa insaan h jiski mai IITK me sabse zyada respect krta hu. Kuch bohot kareebi baatein tujhe batai bhi thi, kuch aaj bhi sunn lo. Jab bhi eye contact hota tha apna, dil khush ho jaata tha mera chahe din kitna bhi kharab ho. Jab apan last ke kuch din jiye the Hall-9 me, terko  Dinesh aur Hitesh ko jaate dekh aankhein bhar aai thi. Hall-12 me uss raat daaru party me, tu jab full nashe me tha aur sab naach rahe the, teri aankhon ke aansu dekh ke mera bhi dil bhar aaya tha. Tu show nahi hone deta zyada, daba ke rakhta h apni feelings ko, lekin hum sab jaante h ki tu sabse kitna pyaar krta h.

Keep up the grind in life, Ritesh. Cheers to days we had and cheers to the day we meet again.
author: Vijit  Malik

text:
Hi, Mr. Deserving DOPA. Bada hi impressive jaankaari rakhte ho tum P***hub ki abhinetriyon ke baare me. 
Shashank tu mera first time tha. And first time as in 'GPL'. Meri ek hi GPL hui h ab takk, aur wo bhi tere haatho dwara. Bhoola nahi hu mai summer term, jab mai apne birthday ke din raat ko 1 baje RM me baitha tha, kaanp raha tha. Bhai, tere liye mai kya hi likhu, gine chune dost hain, saare ek se badhke ek. And tu uss list me to h hi XD. 
Jab bhi sutta maarta hu aajkal delhi me. Do puff maarne ke baad haath automatically side me jaata h, ye lgta h ki tu h saath me. 

Chal ab kuch dil ki baat jo shayad mai sirf bhand hone ke baad bolu: Tu merpe itna bharosa rakhta h jitna merko khud pe nahi h, mai try krunga to tumhari expectations tkk jaane ka hopefully. Jis din director ka 26 April waala mail aaya tha, apan dono ki same haalat thi. Uss din se lagatar photo kheechne ka decision kabhi regret nahi krunga. Shashank bhai, maine IITK ko itna kosa h ki behenchod mechanical kyu le li. But if I get reborn over a million times, I would still choose Mechanical, to meet you. Love you bro.

PS: Sintex pure da best, Forget Tyagi,
author: Vijit  Malik
